purpose: Everyone who wants to meet up in Boston, let’s organize it here. HS Employees welcome too
text: set the channel description: Everyone who wants to meet up in Boston, let’s organize it here. HS Employees welcome too

just re-stating what was said in main <#CBF8XQ57U|>, Probably the best days to meet up will be Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday, as most devs will be there  those days.

Tuesday is when the developer track and partner day stuff is happening. I personally am going to be busy probably all the way up until 5:15 when dev track stuff ends.

If anyone is familiar with the area, suggestions for places to meet up would be awesome.

purpose: Everyone who wants to meet up in Boston maybe get drinks or something -- let’s organize it here. HS Employees welcome too
text: set the channel description: Everyone who wants to meet up in Boston maybe get drinks or something -- let’s organize it here. HS Employees welcome too
Monday or Tuesday evening would be best for me
Mon or Tue evening for me as well
Monday or Tuesday it is then
If we do it Monday I think it should be late  like 8 or 9 pm so everyone can check in to hotels and what not and have time to figure out how to get where we’re meeting

got some recommendations from my Boston coworker:
>Moonbar is fun, the Hawthorne, BOND lounge, Drink is a fun place near the convention center...cheeky monkey is a brewery near fenway that has games like pool and ping pong and i believe you can reserve the back room, might be worth looking into
reserving a room would be cool, though they’d probably want it to be like a party or meeting where a company sponsors it. don’t think i can get my boss to pay for it
same...so scrap that, but the locations sound cool otherwise
yea. I’d be down for any of them, though my vote would be for *cheeky monkey* (ping pong and pool sounds awesome)
Cheeky monkey is fun
What jon said. bonus points if they have a dart board...
3 votes Cheeky Monkey
They do

So just reviewed the schedule for Inbound itself - (non partner day)Inbound officially starts at 5:30pm Tuesday. I don’t know how many devs are going to try to attend some of those events, but just to play it safe, I think we should stick with *Monday night.* That way people who want to catch inbound stuff don’t miss out
ill be there monday through thursday, fly out friday afternoon

I live close to Boston so I'm going to drive in for the partner day and drive back to where I live but will stay in Boston on Wednesday and Thursday. I wouldn't mind driving down for the meetup if everybody is okay with Monday
Niiiiiice, this should be fun!
I'm down for Monday Night.... just can't get too crazy. need to help organize everything Tuesday :stuck_out_tongue:
Tuesday night will be hard with the INBOUND keynote. It's common that most folks migrate to that
